stem: Which scenario best increases risk for deep vein thrombosis (DVT) according to the overview?

choices.A: Frequent ankle pumping during long flights
choices.B: Incompetent deep fascia with prolonged immobilization
choices.D: Standing desk use with periodic walking

rationale_correct: Venous stasis from incompetent deep fascia and immobility predisposes to thrombus formation; embolization can cause PE.

rationale_distractors.A: Movement improves the musculovenous pump, reducing risk.
rationale_distractors.C: Exercise enhances venous return rather than stasis.

evidence.citation: Heck C. Lower Limb Overview Handout — DVT and musculovenous pump. Jun 16, 2025.
